quote.fullQuote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quote.middleQuote: let no one ever come to you

quote.fullQuote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
quote.endQuote: , but by the seeds that you plant.

quote.fullQuote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote.middleQuote: to those who believe in the beauty

quote.fullQuote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quote.beginningQuote: It is during our darkest moments

quote.fullQuote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quote.beginningQuote: Never let the fear of striking out

quote.fullQuote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quote.beginningQuote: Many of life's failures are people
quote.middleQuote: who did not realize how close they were
quote.endQuote: to success when they gave up.

quote.fullQuote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood
quote.beginningQuote: Life is a succession of lessons
